channel.title: Scuba on Duane Newman
channel.description: Recent content in Scuba on Duane Newman

item.title: Diving in Bonaire - 2016
item.description: I decided to take a few minutes and reflect on my recent trip to Bonaire and share some accomplishments and observations. To begin with, the flight there is long. We had two options, 45 minute layover to catch an international flight with all our luggage, or 5 hour layover waiting in the airport. We chose the later since no on wanted to miss a flight that only happens once a day and only on Saturday and Sunday each week.

item.title: Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 3 - On the Road)
item.description: This is part 3 in a series on scuba travel and our trip to Honduras. Related Posts Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 1 - Packing) Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 2 - Traveling Photographer) Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 3 - On the Road) Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 4 - Lodging) Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 5 - Diving) Travel We were traveling from cold weather to warm weather, so we planned ahead and packed shorts in our carry-on so that while we stopped for a layover in Atlanta we could change out of our warmer weather pants.

item.title: Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 2 - Traveling Photographer)
item.description: Traveling with your photography equipment can be challenging when you are taking all your pictures on dry (or at least solid) ground. Add all the equipment you need if you are going to get wet with you camera and it becomes a production just getting it all to your destination. When I first looked into what to do I had a hard time finding information on what other were doing, so I hope you find this helpful as you plan your underwater photography dive trip.

item.title: Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 1 - Packing)
item.description: This is part 1 in a series on scuba travel and our trip to Honduras. Related Posts Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 1 - Packing) Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 2 - Traveling Photographer) Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 3 - On the Road) Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 4 - Lodging) Diving the Bay Island of Guanaja, Honduras (Part 5 - Diving) In January my wife and I took our first real scuba diving vacation with our dive shop, The Playground Dive Shop, to the island of Guanaja, Honduras where we stayed and dived with the Villa on Dunbar Rock.
